banner.title: After more than two years of working as a developer, I realized that Frontend programming is what I enjoy the most. So I hope I can contribute something to the team with my current knowledge.

about.heading: About Me
about.spec: I'm Nguyen Tan Dat, graduated in Information Technology - from Can Tho University. I have more than two years of working for an outsourcing company in both developer and tester positions. After that time, I realized that programming web interfaces and app interfaces are what I like the most. So I spent more time and effort on it. I am a friendly person with a high sense of responsibility and always learn to improve my knowledge and skills.

contact.title: If you are looking for a front-end developer, I hope to become a member of your team.
contact.name: Your Name
